record.id: field.name="type" and file.name="upgrade" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: type
record.file.name: upgrade

brief.brief: The type of unload or upgrade.
- The mandatory values for unloading are File or Application.
- The mandatory values for upgrading are File, Application, or Dbdict; and module.

detail.detail: Select File to indicate that the named table (as a whole) or selected records should be unloaded to the target table.
Select Application to unload the named application as a whole, including format, code, enclapplication, and application records.
This field specifies the phase of the upgrade process to update this record and log upgrade progress.
The module (title of module) must be present for each module that appears on the list of modules to upgrade.
